action.description: Taken from Chief Clerk's desk.Placed on General File.Read third time. Amended. (Amend. No. 993.)Dispensed with reprinting.Read third time. Passed, as amended. Title approved, as amended. (Yeas: 42, Nays: None.)To printer.From printer. To engrossment. Engrossed. First reprint.To Senate.In Senate.Assembly Amendment No. 993 concurred in.
